articles.title: X-ray tech who died after second COVID-19 vaccine killed by heart disease, coroner says - OCRegister
articles.description: Rochelle Zook has decided to preserve samples of her husband’s tissue for future testing, hoping to unlock a mystery as more data about the vaccines emerge in years to come.
